CustomField.defaultValue: IF($RecordType.Name = "CP - RFE 3 Components","Commercial Print", IF ($RecordType.Name = "CP - RFE Short Form", "Commercial Print", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Commercial Print", "Commercial Print", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Custom Label Estimate", "Labels", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Nashua Coated Estimate", "Nashua", IF ($RecordType.Name = "POS Estimate", "Nashua", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Packaging Estimate", "Packaging", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Rx Label", "Labels", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Sleeve Estimate", "Packaging", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Nashua/Rx Label Estimate", "Nashua", IF ($RecordType.Name = "Default Estimate", "Packaging", NULL)))))))))))
CustomField.description: Calculated field to capture the Business Unit that the RFE is being created for.
CustomField.label: Bus Unit
